attributes.action: impose a restriction on the resale of tickets to live events, that they must be sold at Face Value only or less, with no fees, except for reasonable shipping costs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Buying a ticket for a popular concert or show is becoming elitist, thanks to networks of people bulk-purchasing tickets and reselling for high margins. The extra profit goes into these businesses, not to the performer or venue, who has received the original price for the ticket with handling costs. 
A ticket should cost its Face Value. Any resale should be due to inconvenience of the original purchaser, i.e. they can no longer attend. 
The exploitation of fans must cease.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
